I started a crawl about a week ago (using 1.4 broad scope and the 
default BdbFrontier). So far I've collected >7 million docs but IO is 
consistently at >50% using top. Sometimes even higher at 90+%.

Here is what's interesting...even if I pause the crawl, IO is still 
busy. The number never dropped.

I'm running on a dual Xeon with a direct attached SCSI array, using 
Sun's JDK 1.4.2. -Xmx1200.

I've done a 7 million docs crawl using 1.0.4 before on the same 
hardware (using domainscope though). From what I remember the disk IO 
was at around 5%. 

Is it becuase of BdbFrontier? Any hints?

Thanks,

-joe
